audioJson.name: DCC
audioJson.fact1: Each tape has nine tracks per side with eight tracks for the audio and one additional track for auxiliary information (track metadata)
audioJson.fact2: This format's shape was similar to the analog Compact Cassette, and its recorders and players could play back either type
audioJson.fact3: This format's players and recorders were auto-reverse,  meaning every player had to be able to position its heads for the A-side as well as the B-side of the tape
